name: PASYOU Adjustable Power Rack, Multifunction Squat Rack Heavy-Duty Stand, Weight Rack Stand with Spotters, Push Up Portable Strength Training Dumbbell Rack for Home Gym Equipment, Max Load 1800 LBS
short_description: 【 Heavy-Duty Steel Construction 】The PASYOU SR30 squat rack is constructed from 2” x 2” heavy-duty steel tubing and weighs 66 lbs for enhanced stability. In factory testing, the rack supports up to 1100 lbs on the J-hooks and 2645 lbs on the safety bumpers. For long-term durability and user safety, the recommended working load is 600 lbs on the J-hooks and 1800 lbs on the bumpers, suitable for most home gym strength training needs.

【 Enhanced Stability & User Safety 】Designed with safety as a priority, this home gym power rack features 4 reinforced safety bumpers (2 per side) for improved balance and protection during lifts. Screw-locked, anti-slip pads on the J-hooks and bumpers help prevent bar movement, while reinforced steel-wrapped uprights and precision-drilled holes ensure a secure, wobble-free setup during workouts.

【 Adjustable Height for Versatile Training 】With 14 J-hook height positions and 7 bumper positions, the SR30 allows easy adjustment for squats, presses, and other compound lifts. The maximum J-hook height reaches 54”, and bumper height reaches 33.8”. It can also be used as a bench press rack when paired with a weight bench, making it a versatile solution for home gyms.

【 Thoughtful Design Details 】All hardware uses anti-loosening damping screws to maintain long-term stability. Four anti-slip foot pads help protect flooring and keep the rack firmly in place. The rack also includes 2 Olympic plate storage posts (2” / 50 mm), compatible with standard Olympic weight plates to keep your workout space organized.

【 Reliable Support & After-Sales Service 】All specifications and load ratings are based on actual measurements and testing. PASYOU adjustable squat racks come with 1-year professional after-sales support, along with 24/7 customer service to assist with setup, usage, or any product-related concerns.

short_description: 【All in One Home Gym Partner】Maximize the use of JELENS squat rack to create your home gym - one machine can meet your diverse needs. The latest upgraded precision steel shaft pulley and polished high-strength solid steel wire rope greatly improve the smooth and steady operation, reducing the noise to the extreme and not disturbing others.

【Outstanding Durability】Made of 50mm x 50mm heavy-duty steel pipes, the power rack can withstand a safe weight of 2000LBS. All steel pipe surfaces are polished by high-speed sandblasting, smooth and rust resistant. name: Mikolo Power Cage, Power Rack with Cable Crossover System, 1500LBS Squat Rack with LAT Pull Down System, Workout Cage with Pulley System for Fitness Home Gym
short_description: [8-in-1 Home Gym]: Mikolo K6 power cage combines a power rack, cable crossover machine, lat pulldown station, 2:1 ratio low row station (includes footplate attachment), chin-up station, dip station, core trainer, and resistance station — all in one unit for your home gym. With the K6 power cage, you can perform unlimited exercises in a limited space.

[Stable True Cage]: Why choose a true power cage instead of a simple power rack? In-cage workouts are the answer. Compared to free weights, in-frame exercises provide better safety for beginners. Weight cage dimensions: 56.5’’L × 67.5’’W × 86.4’’H. This setup allows you to perform in-cage squats and bench presses. Internal dimensions: 41’’ × 60’’, deep enough to fit almost all weight benches. The power cage weighs 230 lbs and features eight reinforcing tabs to increase stability during training.

[Impeccable Stability]: Enjoy smooth and stable workouts with the upgraded pulley system. Mikolo’s improved sliding sleeves ensure seamless operation, featuring four white rollers that glide effortlessly along the riser while protecting it from wear and tear. This upgrade not only enhances your workout experience but also extends the lifespan of the cage, making the K6 a smart long-term investment for your home gym.

[Space-Saving Design]: With 5 holes on each side of the top and bottom rods, you can position band pegs and the landmine as needed. Perform reverse band squats, bench presses, barbell twists, and T-bar rows without space concerns. This power cage features a pedal that flips and lies completely flat on the floor, so it won’t prevent you from standing up to use the cable system. The gym cage also includes 2 weight storage pins, 4 storage hooks, and 1 barbell storage holder.

[Free & Complete Accessories]: No need to purchase extra accessories — everything comes with our home gym power cage. Included: T-bar × 1, lat pulldown bar × 1, tricep rope × 1, cable bar × 1, cable handles × 2, weight storage pins × 2, J-hooks × 2, dip bars × 2, detachable landmine × 1, footboard × 1, barbell spring clamps × 2, and safety bar spring clamps × 2.

What's in the package -Mikolo K6 Power Cage with Cable Crossover System *1; Adjustable Weight Bench *1; 7FT Olympic Barbell *1; 230LBS Olympic Bumper Plates Set (10lbs *2, 25lbs *2, 35lbs *2, 45lbs *2)

name: Power Cage, 2000LB Power Rack with Independent Dual Pulley System, Multi-Function Home Gym Workout Machine for Maximum Stability & Strength Training
short_description: INDEPENDENT DUAL PULLEY SYSTEM: The power cage features an innovative independent dual pulley system with a 1:1 weight ratio on both sides of the frame. This means that the weight you load is the weight you train with, effectively doubling the weight capacity of the power rack. The independent pulley system enables you to perform super sets, drop sets, co-training, and other gym workouts without being limited by a home gym weight stack cap

10-IN-1 HOME GYM: This versatile fitness solution integrates ten essential functions: squat rack, cable crossover, lat pulldown, dip station, pull-up station, low row, landmine station, battle rope anchor, core trainer, and leg machine. The upgraded pulley system provides a seamless and stable movement experience, making it perfect for comprehensive full-body workouts in one compact unit

SPACE-SAVING EFFICIENCY: Designed for optimal space utilization, the innovative frame resembles a half rack, requiring nearly two-thirds less space than traditional power racks. Multiple integrated weight storage areas help organize your home gym, enhancing the overall stability and practicality of your training environment

ENHANCED DURABILITY & STABILITY: With numerous holes drilled into the posts for 3.14" spacing, our power cage offers 20 height options for maximum versatility. Digital markers facilitate quick adjustments, while the standard 2"x 2" columns are compatible with a broad range of market accessories, expanding your training possibilities. The 2 mm thick tubing ensures exceptional stability for all your lifting needs
EASY INSTALLATION: The power cage comes with a detailed instruction manual and video guide for a hassle-free setup. It is securely packaged in two parcels to ensure safe delivery

FULL-BODY TRAINING ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: This package includes a complete set of accessories, such as a lat pulldown curl bar, dip bar, strap handle, tricep rope, foot strap, and pull-up bar. It's ideal for effectively targeting shoulders, back, chest, abs, arms, glutes, and legs, allowing you to train every muscle group with ease

WHAT’S IN THE PACKAGE: Power Cage with Cable Crossover System *1; Lat Pulldown Curl Bar *1; Lat Pulldown Bar *1; Landmine Handle *1; Strap Handle *1; Nylon Braided Tricep Rope *1; Ankle Strap *1; Clips *8; Hanging Board *1; Hooks *8.
